description: AgoraDesk is a peer-to-peer cryptocurrency OTC desk. We are a marketplace where users can buy and sell cryptocurrencies to and from each other. Users, called traders, create advertisements with the price and the payment method they want to offer. You can browse our website for trade advertisements and search for a payment method you prefer. You'll find traders buying and selling cryptocurrencies online for more than 60 different payment methods. If you're new to AgoraDesk and want to buy cryptocurrencies, please take a look at our guides.
name: AgoraDesk
